concat.scalar: Welcome to first bot! how can I help you

SRM Institute of Science and Technology (formerly known as SRM University) is one of the top-ranking universities in India having around 20,000 students and 1,500 faculty. It offers you a wide range of UG, PG, and Ph.D. programs in domains like Engineering, Management, Medicine, Health Sciences, Science, and Humanities.

Curious to know more👇
https://bit.ly/38vn5HR

Around 600+ companies approach SRMIST Trichy annually to place 75-80% of registered students in well-known companies like TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, Infosys, Siemens, L and T, and others.

Placement Cell services:

● Counseling on job opportunities
● Guidance to the students on GATE, IES, GRE, etc.
● Helping students in industry visits.

are offered annually
